job.title: Machine Learning Engineer - Remote
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtmachine learning engineerltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtwe are extremely excited to be working with a rapidly growing truly innovative data analytics technology developer who have grown from a team of four to over one hundred employees in five yearsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtthey are continuing their expansion on the back of a number of successful projects and securing major global partnership and are looking for a machine learning engineer to help drive the companys capabilities forwardltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtthis is a truly amazing opportunity for a machine learning engineer to join an organisation that is destined for great thingsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtas the selected machine learning engineer your skills and experience should includeltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltspan classqlcursorgtltspangtltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtindustry experience developing machine and deep learning algorithmsltligtltligta strong understanding of the auxiliary practical concerns in production machine learning systemsltligtltligtsolid programming skills in languages such as python ccltligtltligtexperience with deep learning frameworks eg pytorch tensorflow kubeflow etcltligtltligtproven experience of endtoend full software development life cycle and best practiceampnbspmethodologies including but not limited to agile methodologies scrum kanban etc building ampamp maintaining cicd pipelines eg github actionsltligtltligtideally some experience or knowledge of cloud services data pipelines andor distributed ml egusing docker kubernetes etcltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtplease note even if you dont have exactly the background indicated do contact us now if this type of job is of interest we may well have similar opportunities that you would be suited to and of course we always get your permission before submitting your cv to a companyltpgt
